data.name: Experience Design Center of Excellence
data.description: Accion's Experience Design Center of Excellence delivers comprehensive user experience design, research, and digital product innovation services. The CoE focuses on human-centered design methodologies, creating exceptional digital experiences that drive customer satisfaction and business growth. With expertise in design systems, user research, interface design, and experience strategy, the Experience Design CoE helps organizations build products that users love while achieving measurable business outcomes through design-led innovation and customer-centric approaches.

data.businessValue: Accion's Experience Design Center of Excellence delivers significant business value through improved customer satisfaction (40-60% increase in NPS scores), enhanced conversion rates (25-45% improvement), reduced development costs through systematic design approaches (30-40% efficiency gains), decreased customer support inquiries (50-70% reduction), and accelerated time-to-market through validated design solutions. The CoE enables organizations to create customer-centric experiences that drive engagement, loyalty, and sustainable business growth through design excellence.
